channel.title: Best of Rome iPodGuides - Free audio guides to the Eternal City!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Best of Rome iPodGuides. Free audioguides for your visit to the eternal city. Information on monuments, history, art, hotels and more. Let us show you around in Rome! Just download...travel...listen!
channel.itunes:author: Best of Rome
channel.itunes:summary: Best of Rome iPodGuides. Free audioguides for your visit to the eternal city. Information on monuments, history, art, hotels and more. Let us show you around in Rome! Just download...travel...listen!
channel.description: Best of Rome iPodGuides are free audio guides for the Eternal City. They guide you along Rome's most important monuments, its magnificent history and its elegant way of life. Start soundseeing today, let us show you around in the Eternal City - just download...travel...listen!

item.title: Best of Rome iPodGuides - 1: Welcome to Rome! - English version

description.P: Free audio guides for your iPod or other MP3-player to the most important monuments and neighbourhoods of Rome. No. 1: Welcome to Rome. Introduction to the Eternal City and Best of Rome's iPodGuides.

item.itunes:author: Best of Rome
item.itunes:subtitle: A short introduction to the Eternal City and Best of Rome's iPodGuides
item.itunes:summary: A short introduction to the Eternal City and Best of Rome's iPodGuides
item.itunes:keywords: rome, roma, italy, italia, audioguide, soundseeing, sightseeing, monuments, history, pope, vatican, forum, colosseum
item.author: christian@bestofrome.eu

item.title: Best of Rome iPodGuides - 1: Welcome to Rome! - Nederlandse versie

description.P: Gratis audio-rondleidingen voor je iPod of andere MP3 speler langs de belangrijkste monumenten van Rome. No. 1: Welkom in Rome. Introductie op de Eeuwige Stad en de iPodGuides van Best of Rome.

item.itunes:subtitle: Een korte introductie op Rome en de iPodGuides van Best of Rome

item.title: Best of Rome iPodGuides - 1: Bienvenido a Roma! - Versión española

description.P: Visitas acompañadas para el iPod de los monumentos y zonas más importantes de la ciudad de Roma. No. 1: Bienvenido a Roma. Introducción a la Ciudad Eterna y las iPodGuides de Best of Rome.

item.title: Best of Rome iPodGuides - The Pantheon - English Version

description.P: Audio Guide to the Pantheon. Discover the beauty of one of Rome's most impressive monuments... start soundseeing today!

item.title: Best of Rome iPodGuides - Het Pantheon - Nederlandse Versie

description.P: Audio rondleiding voor het Pantheon. Ontdek de schoonheid van één van Romes meest indrukwekkende monumenten. Begin vandaag nog met 'soundseeing'!
